name: Timothy Brits
bio: I use my platform to raise awareness about ongoing humanitarian crises around the world. I'm a .NET and Node.js developer based in Pretoria, building digital tools that hopefully make a difference. When I'm not at my computer, I'm probably playing with my dog, listening to audiobooks, or getting competitive over board games.
